trans-unit.source: Defines a control and optional event of the control as an asynchronous postback control trigger that causes an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control to refresh.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control to enable controls to be triggers for an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control para habilitar los controles como desencadenadores para una <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

trans-unit.source: Controls that are triggers for an update panel cause a refresh of the panel's content after an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: Los controles que son los desencadenadores de un panel de actualización provocan una actualización del contenido del panel después de un postback asincrónico.

trans-unit.source: Defining an asynchronous trigger control is useful in the following scenarios:
trans-unit.target: Definir un control de desencadenador asincrónico es útil en los escenarios siguientes:

trans-unit.source: For controls that are outside a panel.
trans-unit.target: Para los controles que están fuera de un panel.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are inside a panel when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para los controles que están dentro de un panel cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> propiedad es `false`.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are inside nested panels, in order to cause a refresh of parent panels.
trans-unit.target: Para los controles que están dentro de paneles anidados, para realizar una actualización de los paneles primarios.

trans-unit.source: The control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control references must be in the same naming container as the update panel for which it is a trigger.
trans-unit.target: El control que el <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> referencias de control deben estar en el mismo contenedor de nomenclatura que el panel de actualización para que TI es un desencadenador.

trans-unit.source: Triggers that are based on controls in other naming containers are not supported.
trans-unit.target: No se admiten los desencadenadores que se basan en los controles con otros contenedores de nomenclaturas.

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls either by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by creating a `Triggers` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Agregar <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controla mediante el **UpdatePanelTrigger Editor de la colección** cuadro de diálogo en el diseñador o mediante la creación de un `Triggers` elemento mediante declaración en el <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A> property is required, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is optional.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A> propiedad es obligatoria, pero la <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> propiedad es opcional.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is not specified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> attribute of the control is used to determine the default event.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> propiedad no se especifica, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> atributo del control se utiliza para determinar el evento predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: For example, the default event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el evento predeterminado para la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control es el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> propiedad distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: You can also reference a naming container as a trigger.
trans-unit.target: También puede hacer referencia a un contenedor de nomenclatura como desencadenador.

trans-unit.source: In that case, all child controls in the container that cause a postback are considered triggers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: En ese caso, todos los controles secundarios en el contenedor que provocan una devolución de datos se consideran desencadenadores para el <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

trans-unit.source: Programmatically adding <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Agregar mediante programación <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controles no se admite.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically register a postback control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Para registrar mediante programación un control de devolución de datos, utilice la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> método de la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control when the control posts back.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, llame a la <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> método de la <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controlar cuando el control devuelve back.

trans-unit.source: If you define a control using both <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> and <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Si define un control usando ambos <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> y <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>, se produce una excepción.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control declaratively.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar un <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control de forma declarativa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that is outside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control lets users enter a search term to find in the `Products` table of the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control que está fuera de un <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control permite a los usuarios escribir un término de búsqueda para buscar en el `Products` tabla de la base de datos Northwind.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that is inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control shows the results.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control que está dentro del <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control muestra los resultados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is specified as an asynchronous trigger for the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control se especifica como un desencadenador asincrónico para el <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger" /> class.

Add <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls either by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by creating a `Triggers` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Agregar <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controla mediante el **UpdatePanelTrigger Editor de la colección** cuadro de diálogo en el diseñador o mediante la creación de un `Triggers` elemento mediante declaración en el <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

trans-unit.source: Adding <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls programmatically is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Agregar <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controles mediante programación no se admite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control that triggers an asynchronous postback for an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control.
A server control ID.
trans-unit.target: Un identificador de control de servidor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postback control event that triggers an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control to be updated.
The event name.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del evento.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is optional.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> propiedad es opcional.

trans-unit.source: If it is not specified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> attribute of the control is used to determine the default event.
trans-unit.target: Si no se especifica, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> atributo del control se utiliza para determinar el evento predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists default events for some common ASP.NET 2.0 controls.
trans-unit.target: La tabla siguiente enumera los eventos predeterminados de algunos controles comunes de ASP.NET 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Control
trans-unit.target: Control

trans-unit.source: Default event
trans-unit.target: Evento predeterminado

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the trigger was invoked.
<see langword="true" /> if the trigger was invoked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.HasTriggered%2A> method to provide custom logic for determining whether the trigger was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Los programadores de controles pueden invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.HasTriggered%2A> método para proporcionar lógica personalizada para determinar si se invocó el desencadenador.

trans-unit.source: To see a custom trigger in the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, you can add an directive to the page or to the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Para ver un desencadenador personalizado en el `Triggers` elemento de la <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> (control), puede agregar una directiva a la página o al elemento del archivo Web.config.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger" /> control and determines whether the event that is named in the trigger exists and is valid.
No <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control was found on the page.
\- or -

The event that is named in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName" /> property is not found for the control that is named in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> property.
\- or -

The event that is named in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName" /> property for the control that is named in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID" /> property does not match a standard event handler signature.
The event sender.
The event data.
Raises the event that will trigger a postback and refresh of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control.
Returns a string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger" /> control.
A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger" /> control.
